title: Textile, "Old Ford", mid–late 18th century
creditline: Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper
description: Two fragments, printed in brown, showing a part of the design "Old Ford" drawn in 1761. This is probably an English version as it differs in quality and detail from the French printing. Shepherd seated on a stone wall playing the flute, shepherdess with a distaff and sheep are shown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Old Ford", mid–late 18th century.
mid–late 18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: copperplate printed. Gift of the estate of Mrs. Lathrop Colgate Harper. 1957-180-104-b.
